document.masterDocTitle: A review of some Neriene spiders (Araneae, Linyphiidae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of some Neriene spiders (Araneae, Linyphiidae) from China

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Linyphia birmanica
Thorell, 1887 : 99
(Df)
.
Bathyphantes kashmiricus
Caporiacco, 1935 : 167
, pl. 2, f. 12 (Dm).
Neriene kashmirica van
Helsdingen, 1969 : 261
, f. 359–360 (Tm from Bathyphantes ); van
Helsdingen, 1969 : 265
, f. 361–363

subSubSection.paragraph:
Chen, 1999 : 188, f. 108G–H, Q (mf); Xu, Liu & Chen, 2010 : 3, f. 1–11 (mf, S); Tanasevitch, 2014 : 84, f. 59–65 (mf).
Ambengana complexipalpis Millidge & Russell-Smith, 1992 : 1386
, f. 52–55 (Dmf); Zhao & Li, 2014 : 35, f. 66A–D (m).

Xu et al . (2010)
.
Distribution: China ( Sichuan , Yunnan ), Southeast Asia ( India , Kashmir, Myanmar , Indonesia ) ( Fig. 69 ).
